fcb_fab_flexible_title: Carbon Ink PCB - Most Cost-Effective Choice For Electronic Production
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_zero: Looking for carbon coated PCBs/PCBA? PCBONLINE is your best carbon ink PCB supplier.
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_one: Carbon ink PCBs are printed circuit boards that apply silkscreen printing technology to print carbon ink on certain pads. The carbon PCB/carbon ink PCB is distinguished for its carbon film with resistance, which is conductive and permanent. The carbon ink film replaces some resistive components. Carbon ink PCBs are widely used, especially for the low-power electronics. The applications include TV, telephone, computer and its keyboard, electric organ, game console, micro cassette recorder, etc..
fcb_fab_flexible_advantages_bottom_word_: • Carbon PCB is much cheaper than most other PCB, yet it have stable performance.
• Nowadays there are advanced types of carbon PCB, such as the multilayer, double-sided.
• Used for daily electrical appliances, electronic measuring instrument, especially small or micro devices with multi-functional meters.
• From advanced PCB manufactuer PCBONLINE, you can get carbon ink PCB manufacturing, assembly, components, and one-stop service.
• Carbon ink PCB printing is environment-friendly, which will not pollute the air, water, or soil.

fcb_fab_flexible_related_title: Other Users Are Also Getting a Quote to Related Products
fcb_fab_flexible_related_rigid_word: Multilayer PCB saves the space and weight, and increases capacity through layering. It is important in modern manufacturing due to its versatility.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_tick_word: Carbon Nanotube PCB is the best alternative to the double-sided aluminum PCB. It is light, tough, thermally conductive and inslutative, electrical conductive, and perfect for LED lightning, etc..
fcb_fab_flexible_related_multilayer_word: Halogen-free PCB, its assembly, and components do not contain halogens and is safe for human health. Besides, it has higher flame retardancy than traditional PCB. Using it, your products can be used around the world.
